Текущие задания

Название: {{ task.title }}
Предмет: {{ task.subject }}
Дедлайн: {{ task.time_deadline }} {{ task.date_deadline }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import {TaskService} from "../../servicies/task.service"; // import { Task } from './task'; export interface Task { "id": number, "owner_name": string, "title": string, "subject": string, "text": string, "difficulty": number, "time": string, "time_deadline": string, "date_deadline": string, "five": number, "four": number, "three": number, "two": number, "owner": number, "group": number[], } @Component({ selector: 'app-task', templateUrl: './tasks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tasks.component.css'] }) export class TasksComponent implements OnInit { protected tasks?: Task[]; constructor(private taskService: TaskService) { } ngOnInit() { this.createTask(); } createTask(): void { this.taskService.getTasks().subscribe( data => { console.log(data); this.tasks = data; }, error => { console.log(error); } ) } }
